task.title: cd
task.shortdesc: Change directory command is used to move through the file system.

context.p: The cd or change directory is used to move through the file system easily. For example if there you are located in the Downloads and there is directory called potato and you want to go there you have to enter the command cd potato

step.cmd: Type the name of the directory you want to enter as a first parameter of the command
List all of the directories to make sure you are on the right direcotory
